title: Basic keras CNN with Startified KFold evaluation
description: Introduction This is a very basic implementation of convolutional neural network (CNN) without using pretrained models. Fully implemented using keras. You can learn following things by reading this.  Keras implementation of a CNN. StratidiedKFold evaluation. Utility funcitons required when working with images.  Comment your improvements and be sure the upvote.
